MacIntuneManifest.Name: CIS Level 2 Compliance Status
MacIntuneManifest.Description: Audits macOS security compliance against CIS Level 2 Benchmark standards and returns compliance percentage. Runs in check mode (read-only) to verify ~9000 security controls across system configuration, authentication, encryption, network, and application settings. Returns format: "PASSED: X FAILED: Y, Z.ZZ percent compliant!" for monitoring device security posture via Intune custom attributes.
